title: Domestic Animal - Donkey
description: Donkey Skeletal Mesh with 35 animation set
longDescription:
ANIMATION PREVIEW https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3JUnPZHA-8

Contact: graphics@4toonstudio.com


This is a High Poly 3D Model of a Donkey with meshes optimized to a Low Poly version:

•Donkey - SHP 25968 tris;

•Donkey - HP 6458 tris;

•Donkey - LP 2748 tris.

Model has 42 Bones. 


Textures:

•Donkey - 2 Color Textures, 1 Normal, 1 Roughness (all 4k by 4k).


Model has 35 UNIQE Animations(In Position and Root Motion):

Walk 

Trot

Gallop

Idle

Idle Right Leg  

Idle Left Leg

Hit Left

Hit Right

Hit Front

Hit Back

Attack Left Leg

Attack Right Leg

Attack Front Legs

Jumping

Start Eating

Eating

End Eating

Death

Start Rest

Rest

End Rest

Turn Left 90

Turn Right 90

Strafe Left

Strafe Right

Attack Beck Legs

Gallop Slowly

Walk Back

Walk Turn Left

Walk Turn Right 

Run Turn Left

Run Turn Right

Gallop Turn Left

Gallop Turn Right
